summary: A mockumentary that illuminates penguin survival and mating rituals, as well as one bird's search for love while on a seventy-mile trek with his hedonistic buddies.
cast: Samuel L. Jackson|Alyson Hannigan|Bob Saget|Brie Larson|Carlos Mencia|Dave Coulier|John Stamos|Jodie Sweetin|Lori Loughlin|Jason Biggs|Jim Belushi|Whoopi Goldberg|Damon Wayans|Drea de Matteo|Jason Alexander|Christina Applegate|Lewis Black|Mario Cantone|Dane Cook|Norm Crosby|Cliff Dorfman|Adam Duritz|Vanessa Evigan|Harvey Fierstein|Gilbert Gottfried|Jim Hazelton|Jonathan Katz|Jamie Kennedy|David Koechner|Jon Lovitz|Norm MacDonald|Abbey McBride|David Michie|Mo'Nique|Tracy Morgan|Jeffrey Ross|Jonathan Silverman|Nick Simunek|Abe Vigoda|Rob Weiss|Scott Weinger
title: Movida en el Polo
